amendment.description: Amendment requires a private source to obtain a certification in writing from the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct that a proposed gift of travel complies with all House rules and standards of conduct; and provides that that Committee shall have until June 15, 2006 to develop a permanent plan governing future private travel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 109-441 to modifies section 301 to place a moratorium on privately-funded official travel unless the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct issues a certification that the gift of travel complies with all House rules and standards of conduct.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Lungren, Daniel E..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lungren, Daniel E. amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
